articles.content: Coronavirus has hit the UK hard, with the country recording hundreds of thousands of cases and over 50,000 deaths linked to the disease. England faced Europes highest excess death levels during the f… [+3315 chars]

articles.title: Police share warning of phone scam in Cumbria - News & Star
